{{cpp/chrono/title|1=operator=={{small|(std::chrono::weekday_last)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/weekday_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|chrono}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool operator==( const std::chrono::weekday_last&amp; x,
                           const std::chrono::weekday_last&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

比较二个 {{tt|weekday_last}} 值 {{c|x}} 与 {{c|y}}。

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

=== 返回值 ===
{{c|1=x.weekday() == y.weekday()}}

=== 示例 ===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    constexpr auto wdl1{std::chrono::Tuesday[std::chrono::last]};
    constexpr std::chrono::weekday_last wdl2{std::chrono::weekday(2)};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha
              &lt;&lt; (wdl1 == wdl2) &lt;&lt; ' '
              &lt;&lt; (wdl1 == std::chrono::Wednesday[std::chrono::last]) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true false
}}
